content: doily #41 1 crochet doily № 41 pattern by papushoipatterns skill level intermediate materials yarnart violet cotton thread 50 g / 1 76 oz / 308 yards / 282 m per skein 25 g / 0 88 oz / 154 yards / 141 m 2 mm hook finished size 8 / 20 cm i hope you enjoy this pattern if you find any errors or typos please let me know pollinka911@gmail com you can find other patterns here https //www ravelry com/designers/polina- papushoi you can support my work and buy me a coffee skein of thread here h ttps //www buymeacoffee com/ papushoi copyright 2023 papushoipatterns all rights reserved doily #41 2 abbreviations us terms and notes chain chain st stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet treble triple crochet fp- complete stitch around the post from front to back bp- complete stitch around the post from back to front decrease 2 or more indicated stitches joined together at the top popcorn complete the number of stitches into the stitch or space indicated drop the loop from the hook place the hook in the first stitch of the popcorn set grab the dropped loop and pull it through cluster 2 or more indicated stitches worked into the same stitch or space and joined together at the top picot chain 3 slip_stitch in 3rd chain from the hook each round ends with slip_stitch in the 1st st of the round *_* = repeat around crochet stitches tutorial video https //youtu be/lvief5ialws to make the doily in the same color scheme as listed work rounds 0 1 2 and 3 in yellow rounds 4 5 10 and 11 in gray rounds 6 and 12 in dark gray rounds 7 8 and 13 in blue rounds 9 and 14 in dark blue rounds 15 16 17 and 18 in green copyright 2023 papushoipatterns all rights reserved doily #41 3 pattern 0 chain 8 join to form a circle 1 chain 1 single_crochet in the circle chain 2 9 times join 9 single_crochet 9 ch2-spaces 2 slip_stitch in next space chain 3 counts as first double_crochet here and throughout chain 3 *double_crochet in next space chain 3* around join 9 double_crochet 9 ch3-spaces 3 chain 2 2dc-cluster in first double_crochet counts as first 3dc-cluster chain 2 fp-treble_crochet around same double_crochet chain 2 3dc-cluster in same double_crochet skip 1 space *3dc- cluster in next double_crochet chain 2 fp-treble_crochet around same double_crochet chain 2 3dc-cluster in same double_crochet skip 1 space* around join 18 3dc-clusters 9 fp-treble_crochet 18 ch2-spaces 4 slip_stitch chain 3 2 double_crochet in next space fp-double_crochet around next fp-treble_crochet 3 double_crochet in next space *3 double_crochet in next space fp-double_crochet around next fp-treble_crochet 3 double_crochet in next space* around join 54 double_crochet 9 fp-double_crochet 5 chain 1 single_crochet in first double_crochet skip 2 double_crochet 5 double_crochet in next fp-double_crochet skip 2 double_crochet single_crochet in next double_crochet fp-treble_crochet around 2 3dc-clusters of round 3 *single_crochet in next double_crochet skip 2 double_crochet 5 double_crochet
